content:
Anybody have links to V2 <=> FHIR Mirth channel mappings? Even a single basic one will do. Just something to get us started in the right direction. :)

(We're actually looking for FHIR > V2, but if the only thing we can get is V2>FHIR, we'll start there.)

Huh. Looks like we lucked out. Mirth has a FHIR Listener connector type in the FHIR Technology Preview 2. Quite the opposite of what I thought they would support out-of-the-box. Thought they would have gone with a FHIR Writer first. Okay, think I answered my own question.

https://info.mirth.com/Fast-Healthcare-Interoperability-Resources-FHIR.html

http://www.mirthcorp.com/community/wiki/display/mirth/User+Guide
